Name: Steam Prison
About the game: Setting There are two kinds of people: the rulers and the ruled. The Heights are a gorgeous utopia. The Depths, a filthy industrial wasteland. Our heroine, raised in the Heights, has nothing but contempt for those below. Now an observation mission requires her to descend into that world, and the gears of fate have begun to turn. Features A full length otome visual novel in a fantasy setting. A complete Japanese voice cast excepting the main character and the ability to name your character, for full immersion. Choices, so you decide how the story goes!
Meta Title: Steam Prison: Feb 14, 2019, Hunex and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Steam Prison? Check out the release date (Feb 14, 2019), developer insights from Hunex, and a complete game summary.
